General.Name: Defama Deutsche Fachmarkt AG
General.Description: DEFAMA Deutsche Fachmarkt AG, a real estate company, engages in the purchase and long-term rental of retail parks and shopping centers. The company focuses on small commercial properties in small and medium-sized towns primarily in northern and eastern Germany. It serves real estate, retail, and financial sectors. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
